generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface extending into the distance, with visible lane markings and curbs.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, separated from the road by a curb and bordered by a fence.
- building: A building with a light-colored facade and arched windows is visible on the right side of the image.
- wall: A low, light-colored wall runs along the right side of the sidewalk, adjacent to the fence.
- fence: A metal fence with a lattice pattern is visible along the right side of the sidewalk, separating it from the property.
- pole: A tall, slender pole (likely a streetlight pole) is visible in the middle distance on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and bushes are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, showing a mix of blue sky and white clouds.
- car: A red car is visible in the distance on the left side of the road.
- truck: A red truck is partially visible behind the fence on the right side of the image.
